original_text: Now David was clothed in a robe of fine linen, as were all the Levites who were carrying the ark, and as were the musicians, and Kenaniah, who was in charge of the singing of the choirs. David also wore a linen ephod.
korean_text: 다윗과 및 궤를 멘 레위 사람과 노래하는 자와 그의 우두머리 그나냐와 모든 노래하는 자도 다 세마포 겉옷을 입었으며 다윗은 또 베 에봇을 입었고

sentences.original_text: Now David was clothed in a robe of fine linen
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 다윗은 고운 아마포 옷을 입고 있었고

sentences.original_text: as were all the Levites who were carrying the ark
sentences.korean_translation: 궤를 메고 있던 모든 레위 사람들도 마찬가지였으며

sentences.original_text: and Kenaniah, who was in charge of the singing of the choirs
